description.raw:
I'm in a colcon workspace.

Without the path fix, it fails with:

~~~
$ ./custom_shaders                                                                         
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:365] Vertex shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/vertex_shader.glsl                            
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:414] Fragment shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/fragment_shader.glsl
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:365] Vertex shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/depth_vertex_shader.glsl
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:414] Fragment shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/depth_fragment_shader.glsl
~~~

Then with the `maxRange` line, it crashes with:

~~~
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::InvalidParametersException'                                                   
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(2:InvalidParametersException): Parameter called maxRange does not exist.  in GpuProgramParameters::_findNamedConstantDefinition at /build/ogre-1.9-B6Q
kmW/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreGpuProgramParams.cpp (line 1719) 
~~~
description.html:
I'm in a colcon workspace.

Without the path fix, it fails with:

$ ./custom_shaders                                                                         
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:365] Vertex shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/vertex_shader.glsl                            
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:414] Fragment shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/fragment_shader.glsl
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:365] Vertex shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/depth_vertex_shader.glsl
[Err] [OgreMaterial.cc:414] Fragment shader path does not exist: /usr/local/share/ignition/rendering-/ogre/media/materials/programs/depth_fragment_shader.glsl

Then with the maxRange line, it crashes with:

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'Ogre::InvalidParametersException'                                                   
  what():  OGRE EXCEPTION(2:InvalidParametersException): Parameter called maxRange does not exist.  in GpuProgramParameters::_findNamedConstantDefinition at /build/ogre-1.9-B6Q
kmW/ogre-1.9-1.9.0+dfsg1/OgreMain/src/OgreGpuProgramParams.cpp (line 1719)

title: Fix custom shaders example
